name: Harold: Show-Stopping Hero
description:
Harold hits the red carpet in RPG Maker's first ever stage show! Featuring...

  • A pick-your-own-path-style adventure where your choices control the story!
    • Multiple outcomes based on your choices! Go for a high score!
  • A stage retelling of a classic RPG tale until things take a dark turn!
  • A completely original score that matches the action!
  • A unique 3D perspective that makes you feel like you're in the audience!
  • 20-25 minute play time.

Known issues:

  • Sometimes not all of the assets load. A restart fixes this.
